name: Yume Dreamer
description:
Play as a shy girl called HER who's in a strange world when she enters her dreams. Explore her dreams and experience them for yourself!

Okay description aside here's my entry for Dream Diary Jam 4 and subsequently my first ever released game! I'm new to making a Yume nikki Game so It's small for now, I'll be adding more things later into the game. For now it's version 0.01.
